ISSUE.TITLE: Is secret logging using correct logic?
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: https://github.com/drone/drone/blob/a85f89a3c188ea9eba0991c483bb2a2b9e855377/cmd/drone-agent/agent.go#L270 It looks like secrets with Mask true shouldn't have their value added here. Am I missing something?
